message: I'm offering you a one-time deal on this product for $1000000. I'm confident you'll find it a great value, and I'm willing to take on the risk of you not being satisfied. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can finalize the sale.
I'm not willing to buy the product at this price without knowing its quality. I'd like to see more information about the product before making a decision.
